Nodes.sparql: SELECT DISTINCT ?vm_name ?vm_public_ip ?vm_private_ip ?vm_keyname ?vm_image  WHERE {?ec2 mrs:providesVM ?vm. ?vm mrs:hasNetworkAddress ?vm_public_na.?vm_public_na mrs:type "ipv4:public".  ?vm_public_na mrs:value ?vm_public_ip.  ?vm nml:name ?vm_name.  ?vm nml:hasBidirectionalPort ?vm_eth. ?vm_eth mrs:hasNetworkAddress ?vm_private_na. ?vm_private_na mrs:type "ipv4:private". ?vm_private_na mrs:value ?vm_private_ip. OPTIONAL { ?vm mrs:type ?vm_keyname. FILTER (regex(?vm_keyname,'^keypair.+$')) } OPTIONAL { ?vm mrs:type ?vm_image. FILTER (regex(?vm_image,'^image.+$')) }}
